name: Customer Edge Virtual Local Area Network Activity
title: VACT
validEntryNotes: Use of this field is based on customer provider negotiations.
Entry of “N” shall be used when adding a new CE- VLAN. An entry of “N” is not valid when UACT is “D”.
Entry of “D” shall be used when removing an existing CE-VLAN. An entry of “D” is not valid when the UACT is “N”.

Entry of “E” shall be used for those providers that require a reiteration of all existing CE-VLANs that will be retained, otherwise existing CE-VLANs are retained by default. An entry of “E” is not valid when the UACT is “N” or “D”.
When changing a CE-VLAN from one value to another, an entry of “N” shall be used for the CE- VLAN to be added and an entry of “D” shall be used for the CE-VLAN to be removed.
usageNotes: Optional when the associated CE-VLAN field is populated, otherwise prohibited.
